title: Who’s been naughty, who’s been nice
author: VD
content_html:
I’m speaking, of course, of the corporations and their attitude towards Christmas vs. Holidays. I’ve already had to modify my shopping a bit this SEASON as I’ve noticed the following in advertisements:

Naughty – Barnes&Noble (happy holidays), Amazon (gifts this season)

Nice – McDonalds

Anyone got any others?
content_text:
